title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.5 - Consent form
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 72.5 - Consent form

State Regulations
A registrant who wishes to participate in the Watch Your

Car program may obtain a consent form approved by the Commissioner of the

Division of Criminal Justice Services at any participating law enforcement
agency throughout the State. The registrant must sign the consent form and file
it with the participating law enforcement agency which provided the form. The
consent form shall contain information identifying the registrant and the
vehicle and authorized users; a statement that the vehicle is not normally
operated between the hours of 1 a.m. and 5 a.m., or, if the registrant has
chosen to utilize the international decal, at any time in the proximity of a
port or an international border, and the registrant's consent to a stop by a
police officer if the vehicle is operated by anyone at such time or location; instruction on removal of the decals upon withdrawal from the program or
transfer or disposal of the vehicle and such other information as the

Commissioner of the Division of Criminal Justice Services may
prescribe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
72.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
